settings.label: Skin Recovery for Men
settings.heading: Elevate your appearance — starting with your skin.
settings.body: A recovery-focused serum built on copper peptide science. No complicated routine. No cosmetic fluff. Just consistent recovery.

settings.label: THE PROBLEM
settings.heading: You handled the acne. The aftermath stuck around.
settings.body: Uneven texture that won't smooth out. Lingering marks that draw attention. Skin that looks worse under harsh lighting. You've put in the work everywhere else — your face didn't catch up.

settings.label: THE SOLUTION
settings.heading: This isn't skincare. It's recovery.
settings.body: The LookElevate Recovery Serum is built for men dealing with the after-effects of acne — uneven texture, lingering marks, and skin that never fully reset. Instead of masking issues, it supports your skin's natural repair processes to help improve tone, smooth texture, and promote healthier-looking skin over time.

settings.label: THE SCIENCE
settings.heading: Built on a peptide your skin already recognizes.
settings.body: At the core of the formula is GHK-Cu — a naturally occurring copper peptide involved in skin repair and renewal. It supports collagen structure and skin resilience, helping improve the appearance of texture and post-acne marks when used consistently.
settings.detail: Supports collagen + elastin production · Improves firmness · Reduces fine lines · Enhances texture + hydration · Promotes cellular renewal

settings.label: WHAT TO EXPECT
settings.heading: What changes — and what doesn't.
settings.body: With daily use, men typically notice smoother-looking skin texture, gradual fading of old marks, more even tone under real lighting, and skin that looks healthier and more composed. This isn't an overnight fix. It's a baseline upgrade.

settings.label: YOUR ROUTINE
settings.heading: One step. No routine overhaul.
settings.body: Apply once daily to clean, dry skin. That's it. The lightweight serum absorbs quickly and layers easily into a minimal routine. No fragrance. No harsh actives. No complicated steps.

settings.label: WHO IT'S FOR
settings.heading: LookElevate is for men who...
settings.body: Want visible skin improvement without cosmetic fluff. Are past active acne but dealing with what it left behind. Value refinement, not hype. Have tried other products that felt basic or excessive. Want one step that actually works.

settings.question: How long until I see results?
settings.answer: Most men start noticing smoother texture and gradual fading within 4–6 weeks of consistent daily use. Full results develop over 8–12 weeks. This isn't an overnight fix — it's a baseline upgrade.

settings.question: Can I use this with other products?
settings.answer: Yes. The lightweight formula absorbs quickly and layers easily under moisturizer or SPF. It fits into any minimal routine without conflict.

settings.question: Is this safe for sensitive skin?
settings.answer: The formula is fragrance-free with no harsh actives. GHK-Cu (Copper Tripeptide-1) is a naturally occurring peptide in the body, making it generally well-tolerated. If you have specific sensitivities, patch test first.

settings.question: Does this help with acne scars?
settings.answer: It's designed to help improve the appearance of post-acne texture and marks by supporting your skin's natural repair processes. It works on the aftermath — not active breakouts.

settings.question: Is it fragrance-free?
settings.answer: Yes. No fragrance, no essential oils. The formula is designed to be invisible in your routine — you won't smell it.

settings.question: How often should I use it?
settings.answer: Once daily, applied to clean, dry skin. That's the entire routine. Consistency matters more than quantity.

settings.heading: Your face sets the baseline. Elevate it.
